title: Resource Priorities
body: Defines a means for site developers to programmatically give the User Agent hints on the download priority of a resource.

comments.body:
Maybe this feature request could be renamed to match the new proposed solution for this:
https://wicg.github.io/priority-hints/

This is one of the most important and useful of features listed on status.modern.ie. In particular, the postpone attribute would obviate much of the need for performance-intensive scrolling-based lazy loading functionality in JS.
